title: Boris Johnson’s Successor Will Face  Challenges With Post-Brexit Turmoil, Inflation, Energy
sub_head: Brexit has been chronic drag on British growth, compounding the pain of inflation that is the highest among G-7 economies
body:
LONDON—Boris Johnsonswept to power in 2019 with a promise to take Britain out of the European Union and lead it into a new era of economic growth and prosperity.
But now, as he resigns amid scandal, his successor will need to contend with an economy that has languished since the split with the EU and is now facing surging inflation.
